content:
road.
## How It’s Different
- Works across any platform or chat tool
- Search by words, tags, or context — not just file names
- Retains your own context and links it back to the source
## Short Roadmap
1. MVP — Chat & document upload, instant search, basic tags.
2. Phase 2 — Cross-platform connectors (Slack, email, docs).
3. Phase 3 — Smart tagging & AI summarization for any search result.
4. Phase 4 — Shared team vaults with permissions.
5. Phase 5 — Offline/local mode for full privacy control.
